backend/main.mo: Defines investment plans, AI insights, and leads, initializes default data, and provides comparison helpers using Map storage.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping a specific pricing update requirement to affected frontend components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Lists short descriptions of all major frontend files and components for quick reference.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based CSS defining theme variables, dark mode values, and base styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading fonts, metadata, dark body class, and mounting the React app.
frontend/public/favicon.svg: SVG favicon featuring a red geometric icon on a dark rounded background.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component rendering the LandingPage with global styles.
frontend/src/components/insights/AIInsig: Displays AI insights from backend with loading, error, and card layout states.
frontend/src/components/site/AnalyticsPr: Shows animated portfolio analytics with metrics, charts, and illustrative-data disclaimer.
frontend/src/components/site/ContactSect: Renders a contact form with validation, lead submission, and optional lead display using related hooks.
Displays a list of predefined FAQs in an accordion layout.
frontend/src/components/site/FeaturesSec: Shows a grid of feature cards describing AI investment capabilities with icons and badges.
frontend/src/components/site/HeroSection: Presents the landing hero with background imagery, headings, stats, and scroll-triggered CTA buttons.
frontend/src/components/site/PricingSect: Loads and displays investment plans with risk indicators, loading states, errors, and CTA to contact.
Provides footer navigation, branding, social links, and a disclaimer with smooth-scroll section links.
Responsive site header with desktop and mobile navigation, smooth scrolling, and a gradient Get Started button.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the backend actor based on Internet Identity and refreshes dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAIInsights.ts: Fetches AI insights via the actor using a react-query hook.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context, loading and managing identities with AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useInvestmentPlans.ts: Loads investment plans from the backend actor using react-query.
frontend/src/hooks/useLeads.ts: Fetches leads from the backend actor when enabled using react-query.
frontend/src/hooks/useLeadSubmission.ts: Submits lead information via the backend actor and invalidates the leads query on success.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles, color variables, dark mode themes, accessibility utilities, and custom effects.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes the app root with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Composes the landing page layout with header, multiple content sections, and footer.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, persisting, and clearing URL and session parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration with custom colors, typography, animations, and plugins.
project_state.json: Tracks overall project state, including versioning, feature definitions, known issues, and notes for a NexaProfit AI-themed investment website. Highlights a frontend-backend loading bug affecting pricing plans and indicates this is a fix request.
